meanings.definition: The branch of mathematics dealing with algorithms.
meanings.sent1: In algometries, we learn about how algorithms work.
meanings.sent2: She is studying algometries to understand different types of algorithms.
meanings.sent3: The class on algometries was both challenging and interesting.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a complex algometries, solving problems effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful visuals to explain algometries to the students.

meanings.definition: The study of pain sensitivity using quantitative methods.
meanings.sent1: Researchers use algometries to measure pain levels accurately.
meanings.sent2: The clinic specializes in algometries to help patients with chronic pain.
meanings.sent3: The humorous sidekick joked about using algometries to rate his own pain.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like an algometries, sensitive to every emotional twist.
meanings.sent5: The new device revolutionized algometries by providing precise pain measurements.
